description: Function: Synthesizes carbamoyl phosphate from glutamine, CO?, and ATP, providing a key precursor for amino acids (arginine) and nucleotides (pyrimidines).;Role in LAB Metabolism: Supports LAB growth and protein synthesis by supplying essential nitrogen-containing building blocks.;Probiotic/Food Relevance: Enhances fermentation efficiency and contributes to the production of metabolites that improve flavor, texture, and nutritional quality in fermented foods.;Functional Insight: Bridges nitrogen metabolism and nucleotide/amino acid biosynthesis, playing a central role in LAB growth and functionality in food fermentation.
